page.title: 12Farming Crops.
page.content: The farmer at Bagley Farm farms 720 acres.He owns 240 acres and rents the remainder ,most of which is owned by Lord Scarbrough.His fields are divided mainly by barbed wire but he has the occasional fence, hedge and wall.He grows mostly {barley}and{wheat}, but his most profitable crop is{peas}, providing the weather is good.{Winter {wheat}and {winter barley}are sown in the autumn and {spring wheat}and{ {spring barley }are sown in the spring.The farmer sprays his crops to prevent them from getting diseases.He also sprays to kill weeds.When he sells any corn it goes to corn merchants and his peas go to London markets.His{straw}is mostly used for bedding his animals, and for feeding them.If he doesn't need all his straw he burns it in the field , taking care not to set alight anything else.
